segments.text: Hey , Wen ! Welcome to D . C . ! Glad you came out to visit !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks for inviting me . Actually , I've never been anywhere with so many black people before . It's different .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Howard is eighty percent black . But there are whites , and even Asians here . Thankfully , it's also coed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry , nope . But the Alpha Phi Alpha's are throwing a party tonight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's a black fraternity , right ? So we should see some dancing !
segments.speaker: S2
